en_US.Name: Train and deploy ModelScope model using PAI Python SDK.
en_US.Description: This tutorial helps your walk through the key steps of training and deploying a ModelScope model on PAI, including setting up the Python SDK, preparing the training script, submitting the training job, preparing the inference script and creating an online inference service in PAI-EAS.

zh_CN.Name: 训练和部署ModelScope模型
zh_CN.Description: ModelScope是一个旨在为开发者提供灵活、易用、低成本的“模型即服务”（MaaS）的开源平台 ，在当前示例中，我们将以ModelScope ViT模型为示例，介绍如何使用PAI Python SDK在PAI训练和部署ModelScope的模型。
